```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data("instacart")
instacart = instacart %>%
filter(department == "snacks", reordered == 1) %>%
mutate(reordered = recode(reordered, "1" = "Yes", "0" = "No"), 
       order_dow = recode(order_dow, "0" = "Sunday", "1" = "Monday", 
                          "2" = "Tuesday", "3" = "Wednesday", "4" = "Thursday", 
                          "5" = "Friday", "6" = "Saturday")) %>%
select(aisle, product_name, order_hour_of_day, order_dow, reordered, product_id)
instacart

top_ten =
  instacart %>% 
  count(aisle, sort = TRUE) %>% 
  top_n(10) %>% 
  select(aisle) 
top_ten

 
counts = instacart%>% 
  group_by(aisle)%>% 
summarize(reordered = n()) 
counts
```

The number of reordered products in the top 10 aisles in the snack department 

```{r}
inner_join(counts, top_ten, by = "aisle")  %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~aisle, y = ~reordered, color = ~aisle, type = "bar")
```

```{r}

top_product =
  instacart %>% 
  count(product_name, sort = TRUE) %>% 
  top_n(10) %>% 
  select(product_name) 
top_product

inner_join(instacart, top_product, by = "product_name") %>% 
  plot_ly(y = ~order_hour_of_day, color = ~product_name, type = "box",
          colors = "Set2")

```
